title: How to Shorten Google Maps URLs

steps.title: Go to Google Maps Labs.
steps.content: Go to Google Maps Labs. The URL is: http://maps.google.com/maps?showlabs=1 . A box will pop up. In the box, you will see "Short URL".

steps.title: Check a Google map.
steps.content: Check a Google map. You should be able to see a small tab "Link" in the top right hand corner.

steps.title: Right click
steps.content: Right click on the "Link" tab. Your URL for that map will be immediately turned into a shortened URL, the box widening out for you. Copy and use as needed.
